item.description:
Meet at Jillians at Kenmore Square - on corner of Ipswich and Landsdowne Street.

2.30 ish meet up.

Meet on the second floor - have not reserved a table there as they dont do so on the weekend, but will get there a bit early and try to nab a spot.

Any queries, my mobile (not cell) is 857-222-1283.

Hope to see you there,
Cheers,
H.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Sunday Arvo Meet Up
